li.a: The Governor's Office of Student Achievement Georgia School Grades Report

div.span: Students sitting with their panther pals in their dens.

img.alt: Everyone working together to lay sod.

div.div: Pataula Charter Academy is proud to announce the following Class of 2020 Senior Superlatives; Avery Beckum, Brittnee Coxwell, Emily Dismukes and Kevin Nelson. Congratulations to these outstanding students!
PCA will be open Monday, 3/23 from 3-6 PM for Chromebook checkouts. A parent/guardian must be present to sign out the Chromebook.

article.aria-label: Middle School and Varsity Football cheer tryouts

h3.a: Middle School and Varsity Football cheer tryouts

div.div: Due to the school closure, middle school and varsity Football cheer tryouts that were scheduled for April 6-10 have been postponed. We will provide more info on rescheduled dates at a later time. Please email Amy Peel (apeel@pataula.net) or Julie Richey (jrichey@pataula.net) with any questions or concerns.

Pataula Charter Academy is proud to announce the following Class of 2020 Senior Superlatives; Avery Beckum, Brittnee Coxwell, Emily Dismukes and Kevin Nelson. Congratulations to these outstanding students!
PCA will be open Monday, 3/23 from 3-6 PM for Chromebook checkouts. A parent/guardian must be present to sign out the Chromebook.
